title: Solar-driven simultaneous production of hypochlorous acid and hydrogen from saline water over RhCrOx-loaded SrTiO3 photocatalyst systems
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,745-751
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01163A, Paper
Sayuri Okunaka, Toshio Nakamura, Takeshi Ikeda, Kohei Tsuruda, Hiromasa Tokudome
Photocatalytic simultaneous production of HClO and H2 in saline water under simulated solar light was successfully achieved on SrTiO3:Al photocatalyst systems.
